item.description:
We The Scoreboard welcome you back for another night of Live Entertainment with Radio Edit and Bud Light giving away Red Sox Tickets, Custom Red Sox Jerseys and a Roof Desk Table! This should be an incredible weekend, the Scoreboard Team has missed everyone and we hope this will be a night where we can dance, eat, drink and see one another at a fantastic location. The Scoreboard has gotten a fantastic face lift and I am sure lots of you will enjoy this Sports Bar as we have many , many nights in the past.

The #1 Sports Bar just got better! We are in our final days of renovations and would like to welcome our Scoreboard fans back to check out our renovation and try our new and improved menu! For a full preview of our menu, check out
http://www.scoreboardwoburn.com/

 

They allow us to party the way it should be done hassle free with indivisual checks, great service and a new menu , not that the old one was bad , this is there opening week so there will be lots to celebrate.

 

Dress is casual, I will do the introductions prior to dinner and if you come in later and just feel like dancing thats fine with me, I will get there by 7:00 to get us a table "Please RSVP" if you plan to eat, and or come :)

Band starts at 9pm No Cover Charge

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dinner and Dancing At The Scoreboard
